Prerequisites: THTR 205B or permission of the instructor.
Principles and Practice of costume design for the theatre.The design process and the practical aspects of costume production will be examined in detail. Thecourse will also examine the meaning and purpose of costume in a theatrical and film production.Students will explore an approach to textual analysis and visual research for the designer. Drawingand rendering for costume design will be an ongoing activity.
This is a WAITLIST section for THTR 306 Section 001. Once you have registered in the waitlist there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available.
description: Principles and practice of costume design for the performing arts.
